Vorpal: You are right. Do you hear that, Darkfate? You owe 
Nightstrike your life now! Drones, deactivate this section.

The electrical tension suddenly stopped, allowing Darkfate to get 
out of the trench.

Vorpal: Can we finally stop bickering about my leadership and get 
down to important things, now?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Darkfate/Bightstrike:
> 
> 
> Darkfate screamed with pain trying to freed himsefl, watchin this 
Nightscream walked camly in front of Vorpal and said  politely " 
Excuse me, to say my opinion... but I guess that it isn't good idea 
to fry Darkfate... "
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Nic 
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>   Sent: Friday, July 08, 2005 5:24 PM
>   Subject: Re: The Awakened
> 
> 
>   The general took the shots in the back and did not reply. He 
simply
>   walked up to the outer rim and looked for a working drone.
> 
>   Vorpal: Is this section activated?
> 
>   Drone: Yes General. Tension is on.
> 
>   There was no more said. He calmly went back to the group, then 
grabbed
>   Darkfate and hurled him on the rubyline plate. The electric 
tension
>   started cumulating and was soon going to fry Darkfate...
> 
>   --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
>   > Darfate/Nightstrike::
>   > 
>   > "AND THIS MANIFICIENT BASE WOULD HAVE A MAGNIFICIENT BOSS:
>   MEE!!!!"Said Dark fate while he traechorous attacked Vorpal, in 
ispite
>   of his wound and shot 25 times against him.
>   > 
>   > Nightstrike didn't moved, the best politics always is obey to 
most
>   powerful, and ceirtainly Vorpal looked more powerful.
>   >   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   >   From: Nic 
>   >   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>   >   Sent: Wednesday, July 06, 2005 6:29 PM
>   >   Subject: Re: The Awakened
>   > 
>   > 
>   >   Vorpal was getting more and more surprised. Pleasantly 
surprised.
>   > 
>   >   Vorpal: Aaah! More troops, I see! You have spirits in you, 
and that is
>   >   what I will require of you. But I warn you to keep your 
arrogance for
>   >   the Cybertronians or I will personally make you regret it. 
Kill me,
>   >   though, and our Master will make sure you suffer from 
something worse
>   >   than termination.
>   > 
>   >   He let the threat sink in just a little bit.
>   > 
>   >   Vorpal: In the mean time, I welcome you to Searing Eye Base.
>   > 
>   >   He waved his arm towards the construction site. Over 
thousands of
>   >   kilometers, trenches were being dug and rubyline metal 
installed in
>   >   them. The effect was that The land itself seemed as if it was
>   burning..
> 
> 
>
